detaileddescription.para: Handle to store the main Command processor handle to be used by run-time event driven threads
OS thread handle for Application controller to be used by run-time blocking threads

memberdef.name: BLESetupInfo
memberdef.initializer: = { .DeviceName = APP_CONTROLLER_BLE_DEVICE_NAME, .IsMacAddrConfigured = false, .MacAddr = 0UL, .Service = BLE_XDK_SENSOR_SERVICES, .IsDeviceCharacteristicEnabled = true, .CharacteristicValue = { .ModelNumber = &ModelNumberCharacteristicValue[0], .Manufacturer = &ManufacturerCharacteristicValue[0], .SoftwareRevision = &SoftwareRevisionCharacteristicValue[0] }, .DataRxCB = AppControllerBleDataRxCB, .CustomServiceRegistryCB = NULL, }

detaileddescription.para: variable to store the sensor sample time

memberdef.name: ExternalSensorSetup

detaileddescription.para: OS thread handle for noise sensor to be used by run-time blocking threads
counter used for toggling low priority data messages.

memberdef.name: VirtualSensors
memberdef.initializer: = { .Rotation = true, .Compass = false, .AbsoluteHumidity = false, .CalibratedAccel = false, .CalibratedGyro = false, .CalibratedMag = false, .Gravity = false, .StepCounter = false, .FingerPrint = false, .LinearAccel = false, .Gesture = false }

briefdescription.para: Gives control to the Application controller.

detaileddescription.para: This is a template function where the user can write his custom application.

briefdescription.para: To enable the necessary modules for the application.
Responsible for controlling the Virtual XDK demo application control flow.

listitem.para: Wait for BLE to be connected
Based on user need, sample the sensor and notify all the necessary sensor / high priority data

briefdescription.para: To setup the necessary modules for the application.
This function is to control the Application specific LED indication for BLE connection status.

listitem.para: If connected then Orange LED is turned ON
If disconnected then Rolling LED pattern is provided

parameterdescription.para: Boolean representing the control BLE connection status

briefdescription.para: Convert Decimal/Hex value to String Format to display Version Information.

parameterdescription.para: - Number which needs to be convert into string to display in Decimal instead of HEX values.
*str - pointer to Store/write the Version number in String Format.

briefdescription.para: This function is to convert the integer data into a string data.

parameterdescription.para: - 32 bit value containing the XDK SW version information
str - pointer to the parsed version string

briefdescription.para: This function to Get the Firmware Version by combining the XDK SW Release (i.e., Workbench Release) version (i.e., 3.2.0)
Responsible for reading the RMS voltage of noise sensor.
Demo Application for Virtual XDK mobile application.

detaileddescription.para: In this application, XDK is presented in a playful fashion on a mobile device that is connected to XDK via BLE. Interacting with the physical XDK will manipulate the virtual XDK.
The web links to get the Android/iOS App is given below: Android App: Click_Here iOS App: Click_Here For further documentation please refer the page Virtual XDK Application Guide
